attributes.review: Love I want to be nice to you I want to say it is a great app but it's not I can't lie to you my mom always told me that lying is bad so I will tell you the truth this app is horrible nobody likes it look at the reviews it's horrible but do you know what you can do if you're a Trump supporter u can stop being a Trump supporter and it would be amazing your life would be much better please love this is not a joke I am serious right now this is horrible oh my gosh I can't believe what I saw I don't even wanna explain it because it's so horrible but actually I'm gonna explain it first my whole Room started saying trump is a racist and he's a clown and nobody likes him and cares about him and then my decoration started saying trump 2020 but in a grave stone and I thought that was very rude because after everything he has done for us for our country for everything and my room my whole room my decoration and everything think that he deserves a gravestone he don't deserve a gravestone it's horrible please don't get this app if you do give it a 1 💫 and a horrible review because it's true also black lives matter🙃🤪🙃😋😍☺️😋😋🙃😋😘🤪😛😖😝😕😝☺️😛😉😋😘🥳🙃🧐😋🙃🤨😟🥰😖🤨🥳😕😛🧐😗😛😉😟😘😋🤩😛🥳😛🤨🤨🤣😋🙂😟🥰🤨😗😩😏😉😫😋🤪😋😟🥰🤪😟😋🤨😛😖🥳🥳😛😩😝😩🤓🤨😟🤨😠🧐😟😛😏🧐🥳🤨🥳😝😩😏🤓😏😠🧐😠😏🧐😠😕🧐😟🤨😤😋😤🧐😕😛😠😕🤓😠🧐😟🤨😠🤓😏🤓😤🤓😠🧐😔🥳😤🧐😠🧐😭🤨😟🤓😏😝😡😝😒😝🤓😜🤓😝🧐😛🤨😫😛🤓😩😛🥳😛😤🧐😕😠🧐😠🧐😤😕🤓😠🤓😤😛😖😛😤😝😭🧐😭😟😝🧐😫😏😛🥳😫🧐😠😛🥳😛😟😠🧐😩🤓😕🤓😝🧐😗🥳🧐😝😕😠🙁😟😝😠😘🤨🤨😘🥳😛🤨😛🥳😠😛😏😛🤨😕😛😤🤨😟🧐😫🥳😛🧐😕😛😫😏😖😛🤨😟🧐😩😳😤😤😤🙁😠😅😳😇🙁😫😕😴😴😴🤐😑🤢😮😷blm SAY THEIR NAMES BLM
